title: Bossed Relics
description:
[h1]Improves or reworks some of the weaker relics.[/h1]
Changes can be disabled for individual relics in the mod config panel.

[h3]Boss Relics Improved:[/h3]
* Calling Bell: Upon pickup, obtain a unique Curse and 3 relics. When you draw a Curse deal 3 damage to all enemies.
* Ectoplasm: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Whenever you lose HP lose an equal amount of Gold.
* Empty Cage: Upon pickup, remove 2 cards from your deck. The first time you shuffle your deck each turn gain [E].
* Frozen Core: Replaces Cracked Core. At the end of your turn, Channel 1 Frost.
* Holy Water: Replaces Pure Water. At the start of each combat, add 3 Miracles into your hand. Whenever you play a Miracle, draw a card.
* Pandora's Box: Transform X cards. After X turns play the top card of your draw pile each turn.
* Ring of the Serpent: Replaces Ring of the Snake. At the start of your turn, draw 2 additional cards.
* Runic Cube: Whenever you lose HP, draw 1 card. Cards drawn this way cost 0 until played.
* Sacred Bark: Double the effectiveness of potions. Reduce all HP loss by the number of empty potion slots (max 2).
* Tiny House: Obtain 1 potion and slot. Gain 50 Gold. Raise your Max HP by 5. Obtain 1 card. Upgrade 1 random card. Take 1 less attack damage.
* Wrist Blade: Attacks that cost 0 deal 4 additional damage. The first time you play such an attack each turn, draw a card.

[h3]Boss Relics Reworked:[/h3]
* Astrolabe: At the start of your turn, you may transform and upgrade a card in your hand.

[h3]Non-boss Relics:[/h3]
Bottled Flame/Lightning/Tornado, Cauldron, Dolly's Mirror, Lizard Tail, Mango, Maw Bank, Old Coin, Omamori, Orrery, Pear, Strawberry, Lee's Waffle, War Paint, Whetstone, Wing Boots. See Compendium for details.

[h3]Known Issues:[/h3]
Disabled relics show as enabled until acquired.
